item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ North Bay Python 2018
item.description:
Angela’s Organic Ice Cream Petaluma

One perk of being a keynote at North Bay Python is you get to headline and have your name up on the marquee â­ï¸ It’s really cool!

Thanks North Bay Python for inviting me! I get to immortalize it in my ice cream selfie ðŸ˜

Little did I know that I would return to the conference, and back to Angela’s Organic Ice Cream five years later!

ðŸ¦ðŸ˜‹ðŸ¤³ A very special #IceCreamSelfie #nbpy pic.twitter.com/4feYSs2lRg

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ DjangoCon US 2018
item.description:
Hammond’s Gourmet Ice Cream

It was fun visiting San Diego for DjangoCon US 2018. I gave my talk Don’t Be a Robot; Build the Bot. I think it was well received ðŸ˜Š

This was also a special travel trip, because, well it happens that my husband also needed to travel for work at the same time, so we don’t have anyone to look after our two kids. I ended up taking my kids with me to the conference.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2018
item.description:
Mitchell’s Ice Cream

At PyCon US 2018, I gave my talk What is a Python Core Developer.

It was emotionally difficult to give that talk ðŸ¥²

I went to Mitchell’s HomeMade Ice cream to celebrate.
